name: Intellect Fortress III
text: This spell functions as intellect fortress II, but creatures within the area who succeed at a saving throw against a fear or emotion effect suffer no effects, even if there is usually a partial effect on a successful saving throw. This spell can be undercast.
area_zh: 以你自己为中心的20尺半径灵光
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同智能壁垒 II（Intellect Fortress II）一般，不过区域内的生物在成功通过用于对抗情绪（emotion）或恐惧（fear）效果的豁免检定时不会承受任何效果，即便该效果在通常情况下会在豁免成功时造成部分效果也是如此。该法术可以被降阶施法。
